markdownRemark.html:
This release updates Kubernetes to v1.31.14.

Important Note

If your server (control-plane) nodes were not started with the --token CLI flag or config file key, a randomized token was generated during initial cluster startup. This key is used both for joining new nodes to the cluster, and for encrypting cluster bootstrap data within the datastore. Ensure that you retain a copy of this token, as is required when restoring from backup.

You may retrieve the token value from any server already joined to the cluster:

cat /var/lib/rancher/rke2/server/token

Changes since v1.31.13+rke2r1:

  • Bump harvester-cloud-provider chart to v0.2.11 with app image tag v0.2.5 (#8960)
  • Bump rke2-ingress-nginx to v1.13.3-hardened1 (#9001)
  • Container runtime endpoint description and Docker warning (#8988)
  • Add calico envoy-proxy and envoy-ratelimit images (#9025)
  • Move dualstack to larger docker runners to prevent eviction failures (#9033)
  • Charts: Bump Harvester CSI driver 0.1.25 (#9035)
      • Support CSI Snapshot
  • Bump k3s (#9046)
  • Update to cilium v1.18.2 (#9078)
  • October 2025 bumps for canal, flannel and multus (#9094)
  • Update to CoreDNS chart 1.44.300 and Kubernetes Metrics Server chart 3.13.002 (#9092)
  • Bump images for go1.24.9 (#9106)
  • Add new kubeapiserver argument for cis-1.11 benchmark (#9121)
  • Bump ingress-nginx (#9130)
  • Bump helm-controller/klipper-helm (#9138)
  • Tests: update e2e tests to use images from the rancher org (#9161)
  • Bump k3s and backport uninstall fixes (#9177)
  • Bump runc to v1.3.3 (#9195)
  • Bump traefik v2.11.30 and ingress-nginx v1.13.4 (#9190)
    • Update to cilium v1.18.3 (#9221)
  • Improve PR Trivy Scanning Reports (#9241)
    • Update to calico v3.30.4 (#9250)
    • Update to multus chart version v4.2.300 (#9255)
  • More backports for 2025-11 (#9246)
    • Update to calico v3.30.4 (#9262)
  • Bump k3s and helm-controller (#9266)
  • Update k8s and Go (#9270)
  • Fix race condition with Calico startup on Windows (#9282)
  • Release race condition (#9295)

Helpful Links

As always, we welcome and appreciate feedback from our community of users. Please feel free to:

  • Open issues here
  • Join our Slack channel
  • Check out our documentation for guidance on how to get started.
